Articles.Content:
Get's the satisfying sound of my head exploding.

Inserts Amorian. I KNOW I KNOW it's a sea animal! It just, like, totally ate my dog.

<iframe data-embedcontent="" frameborder="0" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/139489-make-an-alien/&do=embed&embedComment=2585010&embedDo=findComment&page=2#comment-2585010"></iframe>

Find Amorians in the link above.

A wormhole opens in the sky and an Ammarian warship falls through instead! You decide to rapidly relocate to the nearest shelter as his Impairor class vessel plummets end over end towards the ground, seemingly unable to operate within the physical laws of this universe. Just before impact you hear a radio transmission consisting mostly of screams and allegations of "dirty Gallente sabotage"

Inserts an out-of-date box of rations discovered while sheltering.

> 
> 
> 12 minutes ago, Blasty McBlastblast said:
> 
> 
> A wormhole opens in the sky and an Ammarian warship falls through instead! You decide to rapidly relocate to the nearest shelter as his Impairor class vessel plummets end over end towards the ground, seemingly unable to operate within the physical laws of this universe. Just before impact you hear a radio transmission consisting mostly of screams and allegations of "dirty Gallente sabotage"
> 

Pffft! They are just over-sized alien piranhas, but OK! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P") 

Gets a luxury five course meal.

Inserts ammunition from the shelters armory. A guy behind me asks why I'm wasting it. I explain that they will all die in a few minutes. Unless some of them fall in the sea...

The vending machine shoots the bullets back at you, with an embedded gun. It then makes a snarky remark about "This machine does not accept $5 bullets" as you fall to the floor, covered in blood.

Man, that was morbid. Uh...

Inserts children's book.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-05-18T03:36:28Z" title="05/18/2016 03:36  AM" data-short="8 yr">May 18, 2016</time> by cubinator**

Gets this:

![694212.jpg](http://i.gr-assets.com/images/S/photo.goodreads.com/hostedimages/1380335140i/694212.jpg)

Inserts plans for an MHD Lift Fan.

Gets blueprints for the SR-71's turbojets.

Inserts turbojet of the SR-71.

Gets thesis paper written by my grandfather on turbojets.

Inserts $1 bill.

Gets a soda. *Duh.*

Inserts assorted chocolate candies.

A chocolate Jeb comes out!

I put in Jeb.

Gets a SRB with a tiny probe core and single reaction wheel. *SCIENCE!*

Inserts coin slot.

> 
> 
> 10 hours ago, TheSealBrigade said:
> 
> 
> Gets a soda. *Duh.*
> 

*FINALLY,* something NORMAL came out of this machine!!

> 
> 
> 10 hours ago, TheSealBrigade said:
> 
> 
> Inserts coin slot.
> 

Gets [lots and lots](https://what-if.xkcd.com/118/) of coins.

Inserts coin.

Gets 1/100th of a soda.

Inserts Randall Munroe

Gets a baseball shot out at 90% of the speed of light.

Inserts Styrofoam ball...

The Styrofoam ball resists entry into the coin slot, and is then chewed up and sprayed back at you! Now you have tiny bits of foam everywhere, and they wont clean up easily. Several years later you receive a boomerang!

Inserts 17 miss matched socks discovered behind the clothes dryer...

Gets a black hole... that suddenly spurts out the matches to the 17 socks you found. Wait...

I insert a corrupted version of Super Mario 64...

A wormhole opens up, and this comes out:

Spoiler

![tumblr_inline_mud1q7ImRq1r1ndqk.jpg](https://media.tumblr.com/11340b93e2b1e33dae553c6712ff589a/tumblr_inline_mud1q7ImRq1r1ndqk.jpg)

***CHOMP! CHOMP! CHOMP! CHOMP!***

Hurriedly inserts the cage containing that level, hopes it never comes out.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-06-10T02:38:32Z" title="06/10/2016 02:38  AM" data-short="8 yr">June 10, 2016</time> by cubinator**
  
Truncated comes

Instead, you get tiny bits of broken pixels and metal shards shot out at you.

Inserts a Vacuum Tube.

You get a soda can that on further inspection is actually just a vacuum chamber.

Inserts $13 USD, 44 pesos, 800 yen and 97 funds.

> 
> 
> 17 minutes ago, RocketSquid said:
> 
> 
> You get a soda can that on further inspection is actually just a vacuum chamber.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Inserts $13 USD, 44 pesos, 800 yen and 97 funds.
> 

You get a jammed vending machine and a technician standing over your shoulder with a stern look on his face.

Inserts $5 USD and gives a swift kick.

The vending machine deposits a shoe at about 15 m/s.

I insert 90,000,000 funds!

You get a cookie - and the entire Kerbal Space Center for whatever reason.

I insert one of CamTroid's KSP videos.

You receive copy of "Debbie does Dallas", on Betamax.

Insert random bit of rusty metal...

Gets a clean bit of metal.

Inserts 5km long freight train.

gets money from deliveries

inserts [this thing](http://gravityfalls.wikia.com/wiki/Bill_Cipher)

Gets \*REPLY NOT AVAILABLE\*

Inserts two Death Stars.
